data.message: When can you sort out a report ads feature..  There's some shady stuff going around as "sponsored links"

replies.message: Hi Jonathan. The best way to report something on Facebook is by using the Report link that appears near the content itself. To learn more, please visit our Help Center at: http://bit.ly/2iGuLfG. -Hannah
there is no such option in the drop down menu to the right
